# allowsAirPlayVideo

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the player allows AirPlay video playback.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsAirPlayVideo: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring AirPlay behavior

- **isAirPlayVideoActive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player is playing video through AirPlay.
- **usesAirPlayVideoWhileAirPlayScreenIsActive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player automatically switches to AirPlay Video while AirPlay Screen is active.
